cars.description:
Felix teaches Milo the rules of the road.

Also this week: we have had to move Milo's car seat away from Felix's car seat because we've heard the first "Nooooo! That's my seat! Moooom! Milo is touching me!"
cars.title: Cars

delia.description:
Milo started with a nanny, Delia, this week. It's been rocky so far, partly because he won't take a bottle, and partly because he really really misses his mommy. Wish us luck.

Delia also keeps Zev, who is 9 months old.
delia.title: Delia

doublestroller.description:
We've been preparing Milo for Delia by getting him used to the stroller (as opposed to being carried in the Bjorn or the sling). He protested for the first couple of days, but now he likes it.

Felix likes to pretend that he is a mommy elephant caressing his baby elephant with her trunk (this is from a scene in Dumbo). Milo is very confused by the disembodied hand.
doublestroller.title: Doublestroller

drink.description:
Milo won't drink from a bottle but he is getting good with his sippy cup. He can usually help himself to a sip. When Delia kept him, he drank nearly 3 ounces of water in four hours.

However, he categorically refuses to drink formula from his sippy cup. He'll drink water or breast milk, but he throws a fit if we try to sneak in formula.
drink.title: Drink

house.description: It's the return of the foam mattress house! Depending on Felix's mood it's a doghouse, a delivery truck, or Puff The Magic Dragon's cave.
house.title: House

nail00.description: As the weather warms, a young boy's thoughts turns to the Adventure Playground in the Berkeley Marina.
nail00.title: Nail

nail04.description: Once the crew was all aboard, coxswain Dean rocked the boat with simulated waves.
nail04.title: Nail 4

nail05.description:
Hunting for nails. You can exchange 3 nails for a tub of paint, and paint *anything* in the park.

Ezekiel and Felix are so enamored by the concept that they renamed the playground "nail park".
nail05.title: Nail 5

nail08.description: After a couple of hours, Ezekiel was evenly splatered in mud and paint.
nail08.title: Nail 8

description:
Milo added a new consonant to his babbling this week:"ka ka ka ka".

Milo often waves back when we wave at him. Communication at last! We've begun to use a few baby signs. He's interested, but hasn't figured it out yet.

In talking about a friend's baby. Felix asked where the big brother was. When he learned there was no brother, Felix let out a heartfelt "that's sad". He thinks every family should have two kids.
title: March 13
